TopicTitle: KSP Real Solar System CKAN Install crash

Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I have been trying to get a modded install of KSP going for a while, so I used Scott Manley's guide to installing mods with CKAN. When I launch it with CKAN, it will load and right as it is about to enter the menu, it crashes while seemingly under the memory limit. Here is the output:

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.6.4f1_99f88340878d]

KSP.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)

in module KSP.exe at 0023:00b473ad.

Error occurred at 2015-09-14_181548.

C:\Program Files (x86)\KSP RSS\KSP.exe, run by larke.

83% memory in use.

0 MB physical memory [1339 MB free].

0 MB paging file [1265 MB free].

0 MB user address space [99 MB free].

Write to location 00000000 caused an access violation.
You ran out of process RAM. Remove part packs, lower the texture pack resolution, and/or use forced OpenGL mode (or DX11 mode) to lower RAM usage.

You ran out of process RAM. Remove part packs, lower the texture pack resolution, and/or use forced OpenGL mode (or DX11 mode) to lower RAM usage.

What's the DX11 mode...? can it be used in conjunction with -opengl?

No , the two are different settings of the same thing, they set the 3d rendering system used.

-force-opengl

-force-d3d11
